name: Police Bus Staff Transport
description:
Time to become a hero in this latest edition of crime city bus driver simulator. You have been hired as a pro bus driver to pick and drop police cops and transport criminals also. Begin your duty in this police bus transport simulator 2015. Crime rate is rising and to control the town you need to transport police officers to their desired locations so they can control the situation accordingly. Robbers, thief and criminals are running away with serious crimes. You are presented with various driving missions to pick and drop at various locations so they can chase down criminals. Bring back the peace to your city and play as a police bus criminal transport driver. Smash the criminals, don’t be late or you might miss a crime scene.


Act as the city bus driver on a duty to transport criminals and police cops to their duty areas, crime scenes, police stations, hospitals and more. Drive the city, follow the traffic rules and fulfill your duty as the police bus driver. Enjoy the thrilling game play with various driving and bus simulation missions. Drift on the roads, ride fast and be a furious bus driver. Don’t let the city turn into crime town. Pick and drop police cops to maintain peaceful city environment.


***** GAME FEATURES *****

• 10 Thrilling Game play Missions
• Real-time Bus Driving
• Pick and Drop Police Officers from Different Locations
• Explore the City Environment
• Smooth Steering, Brakes and Drifting
